abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by countertenor Andreas Scholl, accompanied by the English Concert, at Zankel Hall.
snippet: The German countertenor Andreas Scholl performed songs of Purcell with the English Concert.
lead_paragraph: The German countertenor Andreas Scholl performed songs of Purcell with the English Concert.

headline.main: This Time Dido’s Lament Streams Forth From a Burly Man
headline.print_headline: This Time Dido’s Lament Streams Forth From a Burly Man
headline.seo: Andreas Scholl and the English Concert - Review
